c:
Rewritten for possible colorblind readers:

I discovered my sister's boyfriend is colorblind today.

If only he had seen the blood-spattered walls of the green bathroom, with his name written in bloody letters, before inviting me over to create missing person posters for my sister.





Red-green color blindness is the most frequently occurring type of color vision deficiency that causes difficulty in distinguishing between red and green colors. Protanopia and deuteranopia are severe forms of this condition that render individuals completely unable to distinguish between red and green colors.
